name: Thomas & Joy
description:
This is the story of Thomas and Joy 2 cute little blobs work together to be united again after an evil spell was cast to keep them apart. Help them find each other by solving 9 short levels whist enjoying the story telling narration in every level. 

This game was made for the Brackeys Jam 2021

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Rules

Solve the puzzle by taking both Thomas and Joy to their Home. Press Ctrl to swap between them 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls and Game Play

  • WASD or arrows to navigate them through the puzzle 
  • Use SPACE BAR to Jump, press twice to double jump
  • CTRL (left or right) to switch between Thomas and Joy
  • Press 'P' at any time to pause game and go to main menu. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits - Game was entirely designed by me including the art and music.

Voice Acting by : Jane Wing
